original: 《 裝備取得 》為了提升戰力，想要獲得更加精良的武器裝備、軍隊攜行設施，可以多多掃蕩賊寨、向造訪行商購買，大地圖上也會不定時出現行腳商人！
text: "Equipment Acquisition" In order to improve combat power, if you want to obtain more sophisticated weapons and equipment, and military carrying facilities, you can wipe out more thieves and buy from visiting merchants. Traders will appear on the big map from time to time!
